page.title: 19Farming
page.content: Fulready has the only intensive farming unit in our area.This is a poultry unit for battery hens.This makes it possible for the farmer to house 1,000 hens in a comparitvely small space.The birds are kept in continued artificial light with access to food and water. Thus they are highly productive and economically viable.All the farms in our area predominately mixed arable but none of the farmers specialise completly. They have either some sheep or beef cattle or both.The arable crops are mainly cereal wheat or barley but oil seed rape is becoming popular because of the increased demand for uegetable oil.Grass crops are for the cattle and sheep but some is specifically grown for high quality hay. Nearby is the centre of the Warwickshire Hunt and the demand for good hay is constant.
